Evaluate the electric potential of volume conductor.

evaluate_potential(n_dof_limit: int = 1000000.0, n_refinements: int = 1) → tuple[source]

Evaluate electrical potential of volume conductor.

Parameters:
  • n_dof_limit (int) – Maximal number of Demensions of Freedom of FEM space.
  • n_refinements (int) – Number of mesh refinements.
Returns:

return – Postprocessed data: lectric_field, V_contact, Power, potential

tuple
